title: Replacing and Fitting a new Ceiling Light in the Bedroom
review: I'm over the moon with the service received through Checkatrade.  The Electrician, Ashley, was prompt in picking up my request, we agreed a date and time.  He was punctual, polite and helpful.  His work was to a high standard, no mess, no fuss and advice on suitable lightbulbs.  He asked questions I hadn't thought about, i.E.  The "drop" from the ceiling (which is high) so that he could adjust the length of chain to suit MY needs.  Very good value for a job well done.  Will definitely recommend to friends and neighbours.  Thank you CheckaTrade, will use again.
name: Renegade Electrical Ltd
